column5: I received a call today and things do not look good for Ruth. To: Mrs Hefferman(Ruth) I will miss you dearly You kept all of us happy and safe You are a mother to us all Words can say alot My tears say more You are my best friends mother,a person I can call a mother You are a friend You have been through a lot in your life and I wish you peace in the lords arms when the time comes As well as Mr heffermans arms I as well as my family will miss you dearly My girls and I will visit with chocolate and roses and emily and samantha will sing their santa song for you It glows like a light bulb
